name: @razor_rsd/ytnotify
description: A lightweight Node.js package for receiving real-time YouTube video upload notifications using PubSubHubbub/WebSub protocol. Features TypeScript support, Express middleware integration, secure webhooks, and easy-to-use event-based notifications. Perfect for creating Discord bots, notification systems, or any application requiring YouTube upload alerts.

scripts.release: standard-version && git push --follow-tags && npm run build && npm publish
